techmeme.title: The UK Financial Conduct Authority partners with Nvidia to launch a Supercharged Sandbox for financial companies to test AI tools, starting in October 2025 (Sam Tabahriti/Reuters)
Protesters against immigration raids in LA damaged and set several Waymo autonomous taxis on fire on Sunday; Waymo says it is working with law enforcement (Los Angeles Times)
Alibaba, Tencent, and other Chinese AI companies temporarily disabled chatbot functions like image recognition during China's annual college entrance exams (Luz Ding/Bloomberg)
Getty's copyright lawsuit against Stability AI begins at London's High Court, accusing it of unlawfully scraping millions of images; Stability denies the claims (Sam Tobin/Reuters)
Maryland-based quantum computing company IonQ agrees to acquire Oxford Ionics, which spun out of Oxford University, in a $1.07B all-stock deal, closing in 2025 (Oliver Barnes/Financial Times)
